overview: Carmen has never fit in with her boyfriend, Damon"s yuppie family. Still, every Christmas she attempts to somehow win them over - always failing in epic proportions. This holiday season, Carmen will continue on her losing streak as Damon's snotty, but morally void family engages in a fair amount of insults and forbidden sex all behind closed doors. But, Carmen's charm is not lost on one person - her boyfriend's father. Will she indulge in her own little indiscretions, or will she cling tightly to her desire to be "the perfect girlfriend."
title: Family Holiday 2
